comment.author: 59406631@N05
comment._content: This photo shows British Colonial officers with presumably the last Governor of Tanganyika Sir Richard Turnbull, and Mwalimu Julius Nyerere and Mama Maria Nyerere in the grounds of the Governor's residence, now aptly called Ikulu or State House.

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
This was at Government House, Dar es Salaam, on the occasion of the second visit to Tanganyika by the British Secretary of  State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, in March 1961, for the holding of the Constitutional Conference when the date of independence was decided. 
On the right is the Governor, Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG; Iain Macleod is in the centre,  with Julius Nyerere between him and the Governor.  Behind Mr Macleod is Mr I H Norton,  the Governor's Private Secretary.
